projects.title: XCrypto
projects.description: The Bitcoin Portfolio Tracker is a React-based web application that allows users to monitor and manage their Bitcoin holdings in real-time. The app connects to live Bitcoin price feeds via cryptocurrency APIs, offering users up-to-date information on market trends and the current value of their portfolio.

projects.title: Sidcup_Golf_House
projects.description: It's Sidcup's Golf Club House Frontend Website which has micro animations and scrolling animations. It is desktop based project which uses GSAP features.

projects.title: Weather_WebApp
projects.description: WeatherNow is a sleek, user-friendly web application built with React that allows users to get real-time weather updates for any location in the world. It connects to a weather API to deliver accurate and up-to-date weather information, including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and forecasts.

projects.title: React_Todo
projects.description: TodoPro is a feature-rich to-do list application built using React that allows users to manage data efficiently. The app integrates with a RESTful API using Axios for fetching data and performs full CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations to manage tasks on a server.
